website_summaries.verdict: Great price on a set of stress balls in your favorite sports theme.
pros: Comes in footballs, baseballs, basketballs, soccer balls, or a variety pack
Great value for crafts, fantasy football drafts, or parties
Good consistency for stress relief or for a toy
cons: This set only comes in a sports theme, which might not fit your needs

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: These miniature footballs are very poorly made. Along the center seams are plenty of tiny, very distracting holes. PThey are also incredibly light in color, I’ve never seen a football in the shade of tan before. If you were looking for Valentine’s Day favors, etc., you’d be better off going with oriental trading. I now have to order from them to get something that looks realistic and it has delayed my project timeline. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonInSC

customer_reviews.title: Used as alternative Vday goodies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my son's football themed valentine's day box in lieu of the typical candy gifts. The kids loved them and my son and I enjoyed playing catch down the hallway after they arrived. They're soft and light-weight so there's no concern with breaking something or hurting someone with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Squishy but stinky
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as end of season party favors. Quality was pretty good but there was a few in the package with some imperfections but can't really complain for the price. My only complaint is that they were stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Really good price!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a photo prop, super good price for amount you get!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Put them in a gift bucket for the 17 graduating seniors
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for the goodie bags at my son’s football-themed party. They held up well, and the boys enjoyed throwing them around.
customer_reviews.author: MississippiMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make awards at work. They were perfect and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for football valentines
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for his valentines and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyann7

customer_reviews.title: Great treat bag item
customer_reviews.text: Gave to 7 year old football team. They loved them.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Good party favor item.
customer_reviews.text: Great party favor for my son’s 7th birthday party. Item exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Troy Severson

customer_reviews.title: The product was safe for children and held up in outside conditions.
customer_reviews.text: I used the plastic footballs as an accessory on my cement goose clothes . This is used as a outside ornament for the goose. It held up in all weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: pat rife

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The footballs are perfect and squishy. A few have weird indentations on then but still work fine. Immediately when I opened the package, a smell appeared of marker and plastic. It’s not as strong after a little bit of time. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Abyni

customer_reviews.title: Touchdown!
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with theses! Used as goodie bag stuffers for sports-themed party! Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Akeba

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful party favors for ten year old son’s bedlam birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Heape

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: When I took them it package some had missing pieces or immediately started shedding foam.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for football themed birthday as favor for the kids. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: gin80sgirl

customer_reviews.title: they smell bad
customer_reviews.text: kids loved the footballs but i had to let them air out for at least a week to get the bad smell out of them. They smell like paint or mildew
customer_reviews.author: kandice phillips

product_meta.title: Mini Sports Balls for Kids Party Favor Toy, Soccer Ball, Basketball, Football, Baseball Squeeze Foam for Stress, Anxiety Relief, Relaxation.
product_meta.description: Great for Everyone! - Children and adults will enjoy throwing and squeezing these mini foam sports balls! Great for relieving stress. Makes for a great party favor and for Sports theme parties! Each pack includes 12 balls. Sets available in all Footballs, Baseballs, Soccerballs, Basketballs and also in a Mix Pack. You Choose! Made from foam, each ball measures approximately 2 1/2" diameter. Great entertainment indoors and outdoors. A fun theme party prop!
feature_bullets: Great for Everyone! - Children and adults will enjoy throwing and squeezing these mini foam sports balls! Great for relieving stress.
Makes for a great party favor and for Sports theme parties!
This package Includes 24 footballs. Sets available in all Footballs, Baseballs, Soccerballs, Basketballs and also in a Mix Pack. You Choose!
Made from foam, each football measures approximately (3.25" in. height) x (2.25" in. width).
Great entertainment indoors and outdoors. Great theme party prop!
